price: 104. Nzoka nde okosenga bango lifuta te тропа yango, wana ezali sé bokundoli тропа molongo mobimba.
arabic: وَمَا تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā tasaluhum ʿalayhi min ajrin in huwa illā dhik'run lil'ʿālamīna
